head-on.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if someone deals with a problem head-on, they do not try to avoid it, but deal with it in a direct and determined way
head-on.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The police are trying to tackle car crime head-on.
head-on.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if two people or teams meet head-on in an argument, competition etc, they compete against each other and try to win in a very determined way
